page.title: 19FARMING (MIXED)
page.content: Bittesby Farm is run by Mr. Barclay. The Farm house was built in 1828, and extended in 1900.The farm consists of 535 acres of{wheat,barley,oats,oil {seed rape}and grass.There are 216 {sheep}and 167{cattle. The machinery on the farm is: 4 Tractors,4 Ploughs,1 Large baler, ,1 Combine harvester,1 Disc harrow and 1 Roller. Manor Cottage,Manor Road.Mr.Ashton. The farm house was built in 1820 and modernised in 1973.It was part of the Manor of Ullesthorpe.The farm consists of 30 acres.The crops grown are mangoes,swedes,{oats,barley,wheat and potatoes.The animals on the farm are:80 cattle 100{sheep}30 pigs 100 chickens.The machinery is 6 Tractors 2 Disc Harrows 2 Combine harvesters 2 Rollers 2 Muck spreaders 2 Ploughs 1 Drill with Bailers and Trailers.
